reviews.review_msg: Beauvais is lazy, sabotages students, assigns post-graduate readings, and gives incomplete lectures. She didn't teach many things she tested for. In a quiz she asked how many kids she had--her 80 year old dog was a child. I dropped from 70% to 50% on a grade because I didn't add the loading code to the pdf and used N instead of N-1 for sample size.
I really enjoyed taking her class, it was definitely challenging however she was really available to students for extra help.
Unclear about instructions, the midterm was so long that no one was able to complete it, and unclear feedback
Great prof, would 100% take a class with her again.

Professor Beauvais is highly knowledgeable and qualified in her role as a professor. Not only is she good at teaching, but she is immersed in important research outside of the classroom that clearly reflects her passion in the field of political science. I am very grateful to have had her as a prof. She's very structured and gives great feedback!
